content: New allegations have emerged from a number of men accusing Kevin Spacey of sexual misconduct.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: US filmmaker Tony Montana claims he was groped by the actor in a Los Angeles bar in 2003.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: Montana says he was left with PTSD for six months after he claims Spacey "forcefully" grabbed his crotch.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: It follows an allegation made by Anthony Rapp that the House of Cards actor tried to "seduce" him when he was 14 years old.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: Kevin Spacey says he has no recollection of that encounter, and was "beyond horrified".

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div figure figcaption span
html body div div div div div div div div div div figure figcaption span
content: It's claimed Kevin Spacey "routinely preyed" on young male actors while he was artistic director at the Old Vic

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
html body div div div div div div div div div div p a span
html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: that he was in his thirties when the incident took place at the Coronet Bar in LA.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: He says he removed Spacey's hand from his crotch and walked away, but claims the actor later followed him into the men's toilets.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div h2 span
html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: Incidents regarding Spacey are also alleged to have taken place in the UK while the two-time Oscar winner was the artistic director at the Old Vic in London between 2004 and 2015.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: Mexican actor Roberto Cavazos, who acted in several plays at the theatre, claims Spacey "routinely preyed" on young male actors.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div span
html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div span
html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: "It seems the only requirement was to be a male under the age of 30 for Mr Spacey to feel free to touch us," he wrote in a Facebook post.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: He said he fended off two "unpleasant" advances from Spacey that "bordered on harassment," but that others were afraid to do so.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div figure span span
html body div div div div div div div div div div figure span span
html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: "There are a lot of us who have a 'Kevin Spacey story'," says Cavazos.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: The Old Vic has set up a confidential complaints process for anyone connected to the 200-year-old theatre to come forward.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: It said in a statement: "We aim to foster a safe and supportive environment without prejudice, harassment or bullying of any sort, at any level."

content: Beal says Spacey gave him his £5,000 watch later that same evening, and a few weeks later called him asking to meet up.

content: The BBC has also uncovered allegations of sexual misconduct against Spacey by a man who claims he was harassed by the star in the mid-1980s.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: The man, who wanted to remain anonymous, says he met the star at theatre school before being invited to New York by him, when he was 17 years old.

content: programme, the man (who they've called John), says despite sleeping on the star's sofa he woke up fully clothed with Spacey lying on him, in his underwear.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: John, who still works in the entertainment industry, said Spacey again became "affectionate" the second night he was in the city.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: "I burst into tears because I couldn't articulate any more what was happening to me. I was scared... To his credit, he backed off and we went to sleep."

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: Reflecting on his experience, John says: "It seems he was grooming me. For me, I never let on that that's what I was interested in. I never discussed it, nor did I want it.

content: John points out neither of them drank any alcohol that weekend.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: "He was either very stupid or he was predatory - or maybe a little of both. I was uncomfortable at best, traumatised at worst, emotionally.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div p span
content: John says he didn't tell the authorities or his parents at the time, although he has since told friends.
